directions.step:
Date: Mon, 1 Apr 1996 22:32:01 -7
From: arlenes@holly.ColoState.EDU
SHERI KONOPKO (GXCH63B)
Pour cold water over farfel; and drain immediately, so that farfel is moist, not soggy. Beat eggs with salt, sugar, and melted butter. Mix in farfel.
In greased 1-1/2 qt. baking dish, place 1/2 of farfel mixture. Arrange bananas on top, and sprinkle with nuts. Top with the rest of the farfel mixture
Bake at 350 for 45 min. or until set, and lightly browned. I haven't tried this one, but it looked interesting. Formatted by Elaine Radis; 3/92
